Morphing Projections

Source: R/morphs.R
morphs.Rd

Morphing Projections

morph_center(proj, half_range)

morph_identity(proj, half_range)

morph_radial(proj, half_range, p_eff)

Arguments

proj

a projection
half_range

scale factor for projection
p_eff

Effective dimensionality of reference data set.

Examples

proj <- matrix(rnorm(20), ncol = 2)
half_range <- compute_half_range(proj)
morph_center(proj, half_range)
#>              [,1]        [,2]
#>  [1,] -0.36496920  0.10692102
#>  [2,]  0.99414593 -0.10804567
#>  [3,] -0.41897616  0.12085349
#>  [4,] -0.29404161  0.56473513
#>  [5,] -0.12439365 -0.13387231
#>  [6,]  0.19418414 -0.03330272
#>  [7,] -0.07424824 -0.12200657
#>  [8,]  0.38677976 -0.39555820
#>  [9,] -0.02819855  0.35967047
#> [10,] -0.27028243 -0.35939464
#> attr(,"scaled:center")
#> [1] 0.1693993 0.3388948
morph_identity(proj, half_range)
#>              [,1]         [,2]
#>  [1,] -0.30768348  0.221524995
#>  [2,]  1.05143165  0.006558312
#>  [3,] -0.36169044  0.235457466
#>  [4,] -0.23675589  0.679339109
#>  [5,] -0.06710792 -0.019268334
#>  [6,]  0.25146986  0.081301260
#>  [7,] -0.01696252 -0.007402593
#>  [8,]  0.44406548 -0.280954220
#>  [9,]  0.02908717  0.474274444
#> [10,] -0.21299671 -0.244790664
morph_radial(proj, half_range, p_eff = 2)
#>                 x           y
#>  [1,]  0.10692102 -0.36496920
#>  [2,] -0.10804567  0.99414593
#>  [3,]  0.12085349 -0.41897616
#>  [4,]  0.56473513 -0.29404161
#>  [5,] -0.13387231 -0.12439365
#>  [6,] -0.03330272  0.19418414
#>  [7,] -0.12200657 -0.07424824
#>  [8,] -0.39555820  0.38677976
#>  [9,]  0.35967047 -0.02819855
#> [10,] -0.35939464 -0.27028243
